ARABIC: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّآ أَن لَّن تَقُولَ ٱلْإِنسُ وَٱلْجِنُّ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We did not think it possible for either man or jinn to tell a lie against Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We had in fact thought that men and jinns would never speak a lie about God,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and that “we had thought that men and jinn would never speak a lie about Allah”,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We thought that no man or jinn could ever tell lies about God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: ‘Whereas we thought that men and jinns would never fabricate a lie against Allah!’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: `And verily, we thought that men and Jinn would not utter a lie against Allah.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And that we thought that men and jinn did not utter a lie against Allah:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and we had thought that men and jinn would never speak against God a lie.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And lo! we had supposed that humankind and jinn would not speak a lie concerning Allah -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We had supposed that men and jinn would never utter a lie against God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And verily we! we had imagined that humankind and Jinn would never forge against Allah a lie.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: We thought that humans and jinn would never utter any falsehood concerning Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But we do think that no man or spirit should say aught that untrue against Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And verily, we thought that men and jinns would not utter a lie against Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: we never thought that either human or jinn would ever tell a lie against Allah!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And we thought that humans and jinn would never utter lies about God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And we had thought that mankind and the jinn would never speak about Allah a lie.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [72:5] And we thought that (an: softened, that is to say, annahu) humans and jinn would never utter a lie against God, by attributing such things to Him, until we discovered their mendacity thereby. God, exalted be He, says:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: And lo! we had supposed that humankind and jinn would not speak a lie concerning Allah) and we thought that what humans and the jinn said about Allah was not a lie, but we know now that it is. From the beginning of the surah up to here, Allah related what the jinn said.
